text:
Nakhoda (http://nakhoda.ai) | London, UK | Senior NLP Scientist | Fulltime , ONSITE

Nakhoda is a boutique tech start-up backed by the Magic Circle law firm Linklaters. We combine legal expertise and cutting-edge technologies to solve complex legal problems.

We hire senior, ambitious developers that strive to make money by solving hard problems. https://talent.stackoverflow.com/employer/jobs/300905/listin...
